trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le opzioni che possono essere impostate per una classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> viene utilizzata per generare schemi XSD da un tipo o un assembly.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> per generare codice [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] da un documento dello schema.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/exporting-schemas-from-classes.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] importazione ed esportazione di schemi, vedere [Schema di importazione ed esportazione](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/schema-import-and-export.md) e [esportazione di schemi dalle classi](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/exporting-schemas-from-classes.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> viene utilizzata da <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> per includere i tipi che possono essere letti in un oggetto grafico.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] il contratto dati e i tipi noti, vedere [tipi conosciuti di contratto dati](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> class and adds a type (`Possessions`) to the collection returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creata un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> e viene aggiunto un tipo (`Possessions`) alla raccolta restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> then exports the schemas of the types, including the `Possessions` type added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> esporta quindi gli schemi dei tipi, incluso il tipo `Possessions` aggiunto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un surrogato di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione dell'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate" /> che può essere utilizzata per personalizzare la modalità di esportazione di una rappresentazione dell'XML Schema per un tipo specifico.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di tipi che possono essere rilevati durante la serializzazione o deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="KnownTypes" /> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta <see langword="KnownTypes" /> contenente tipi che possono essere rilevati durante la serializzazione o la deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.
trans-unit.target: Le rappresentazioni dello schema XML vengono esportate per tutti i tipi specificati in questa raccolta dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> viene utilizzata da <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> per includere i tipi che possono essere letti in un oggetto grafico (impostati utilizzando la proprietà <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] il contratto dati e i tipi noti, vedere [tipi conosciuti di contratto dati](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> class and adds a type to the collection returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creata un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions> e viene aggiunto un tipo alla raccolta restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>.
